axis_supply.supply_status: CRITICAL - Severely constrained by Allied naval interdiction and air supremacy. Fuel at 4 days (marginal), ammunition adequate at 12 days, water critical for desert operations. Supply lines from Tunis port under constant air attack.
notes: Division arrived from France December 1942 with limited desert experience
Supply lines from Tunis under constant Allied air attack

allied_supply.supply_status: NOT APPLICABLE - Division not in North Africa theater. Relocated to Palestine 1 January 1943 for rest, refit, and training after El Alamein operations. Not engaged in combat operations during 1943q1.
